goals.active: Leave the area to plan your next move.

goals.complete: With the antitoxin in hand, we were able to enter the tower. My comrades and I navigated the treacherous maze of endless corridors, which was filled to the brim with krait, Nightmare Court, and other toxic horrors. The Priory's initial attempt to quell the tower failed, so it was up to me and my comrades to fight our way to the top.
